description: Denominators in the Taylor expansion exp(cosec(x)-cot(x))=1 + x/2 + x^2/8 + x^3/16 + 3*x^4/128 + 37*x^5/3840 + 59*x^6/15360 + ...
comments: The numerators are apparently the same as A047691.
maple: A013516 := proc(n)        exp(csc(x)-cot(x)) ;        coeftayl( %,x=0,n) ;        denom(%) ;end proc:  # _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 18 2011
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Corrected by R. J. Mathar, Dec 18 2011
